mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM v17_personal_info t1, (SELECT info_id FROM v17_personal_info limit #{rows},#{pageSize}) t2 WHERE t1.info_id = t2.info_id

mapper.update:
update v17_personal_info
info_name = #{infoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_birthday = #{infoBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
info_age = #{infoAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
info_birthplace = #{infoBirthplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_residence = #{infoResidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_performing_experience = #{infoPerformingExperience,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_family_composition = #{infoFamilyComposition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_occupation = #{infoOccupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_schools_majors = #{infoSchoolsMajors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_grade = #{infoGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_place_of_study = #{infoPlaceOfStudy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_phone_num = #{infoPhoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_qq = #{infoQq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
info_email = #{infoEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_weibo = #{infoWeibo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_home_phone = #{infoHomePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_specialty = #{infoSpecialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_interest = #{infoInterest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_awards = #{infoAwards,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_dream = #{infoDream,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_idol = #{infoIdol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_comic = #{infoComic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_film_works = #{infoFilmWorks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_website = #{infoWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_app = #{infoApp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_want_to_say = #{infoWantToSay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_video1_url = #{infoVideo1Url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_video2_url = #{infoVideo2Url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_mugshot_img_url = #{infoMugshotImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_halflength_img_url = #{infoHalflengthImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_fullbody_img_url = #{infoFullbodyImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_serial_num = #{infoSerialNum,jdbcType=CHAR},
info_create_time = #{infoCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update v17_personal_info set info_name = #{infoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_birthday = #{infoBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, info_age = #{infoAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, info_birthplace = #{infoBirthplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_residence = #{infoResidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_performing_experience = #{infoPerformingExperience,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_family_composition = #{infoFamilyComposition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_occupation = #{infoOccupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_schools_majors = #{infoSchoolsMajors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_grade = #{infoGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_place_of_study = #{infoPlaceOfStudy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_phone_num = #{infoPhoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_qq = #{infoQq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, info_email = #{infoEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_weibo = #{infoWeibo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_home_phone = #{infoHomePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_specialty = #{infoSpecialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_interest = #{infoInterest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_awards = #{infoAwards,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_dream = #{infoDream,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_idol = #{infoIdol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_comic = #{infoComic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_film_works = #{infoFilmWorks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_website = #{infoWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_app = #{infoApp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_want_to_say = #{infoWantToSay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_video1_url = #{infoVideo1Url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_video2_url = #{infoVideo2Url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_mugshot_img_url = #{infoMugshotImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_halflength_img_url = #{infoHalflengthImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_fullbody_img_url = #{infoFullbodyImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_serial_num = #{infoSerialNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, info_create_time = #{infoCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
